commit_message: Merge pull request #4 from emmamarichal/master - Aleo update
notes: The commit ce875e48d9983031648e87f38b7a269f4fbf5eb5 exists and was correctly referenced in PR #6345 when the font was updated to version 2.001 on June 8, 2023. However, there is a newer commit in the upstream repository (acd8d56d from August 8, 2025) that updates uni028B glyph and copyright information.
